document_data.mainbody:
Footmans Folly was a unique enchanted shield wielded by distinguished warriors of Neverwinter.
Footmans Folly was a small, smoothly polished shield made of metal.
Footmans Folly possessed a powerful +2 enchantment to the wielders defense, additionally, it increased the wielders defense further against arrows, bolts, and other missiles.
Footmans Folly was considered to be a badge of honor among the most distinguished soldiers in service of Neverwinter, the Jewel of the North. Over the years, the shield gained notoriety, rumored to the unlucky. Many of those who used Footmans Folly fell in battle, believing that its minor magical defenses would be enough to help them in the face of overwhelming odds. According to the legends, this was the origin of the items name.
In the , Footmans Folly found its way into the blue hands of Xuki, a wizard member of the Legion of the Chimera that menaced Icewind Dale. With her death, the shield changed owners once more.
